dict.string: Ollie wants to use the camera to take photos of your puppy.
Ollie uses your location to save walk spots so you can easily log walks at your favorite places.
Ollie wants access to your photos to add moments.
Ollie uses your calendar to add reminders for upcoming milestones like vaccinations and vet visits.
Ollie uses your contacts to quickly import your vet, groomer, or pet sitter details.
